dict.acceptation: 体格上，身体上；物理上；<非正>完全地；

sent.orig: It is physically impossible for pigs to look up into the sky.
sent.trans: 从生理结构上而言，猪是不可能抬头看天的。

sent.orig: An attempt may be made though completion of the crime was physically impossible.
sent.trans: 虽然完成犯罪在实际上是不可能的，但仍可犯未遂罪。

sent.orig: You are not (physically) strong, so you may as well take care of your health.
sent.trans: 你的体格不壮，因此最好注意健康。

sent.orig: When you are centered physically and mentally, you can effectively extend Ki.
sent.trans: 当你在精神和身体方面都全神贯注，你就能很好的运用气。

sent.orig: Finally, people can feel refreshed both physically and mentally after a period of idling.
sent.trans: 最后，通过一段时间的闲逛人们可以享受到身体和精神上的焕然一新的感觉。
